name: Grabball
description:
I made this game as a solo dev.

I learn Unreal Engine a few months ago and I decided to join the 48 hrs Game Jam GMTK2021 to kick my ass to do something to test my skills which are very limited at this point. To add to the challenge, I use the new Unreal Engine 5A, which is not supposed to be used for production but it's just more fun.

CREDITS

I made all the arts and 3D assets except the music which was made  by 

Wiktoria Zac
